Package com.shouldis.bitset

Class BitwiseSpliterator

java.lang.Object
com.shouldis.bitset.BitSpliterator
com.shouldis.bitset.BitwiseSpliterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Spliterator<java.lang.Integer>, java.util.Spliterator.OfInt, java.util.Spliterator.OfPrimitive<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.function.IntConsumer,​java.util.Spliterator.OfInt>
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitwiseSpliterator.And, BitwiseSpliterator.Or, BitwiseSpliterator.XOr
public abstract class BitwiseSpliterator
extends BitSpliterator
Implementation of BitSpliterator that is creates a stream of indices that represents which bits will be live after performing a bitwiseFunction(long, long) between the words of 2 BitSets at the same word index. The three traditional operations: BitwiseSpliterator.And, BitwiseSpliterator.Or, and BitwiseSpliterator.XOr are provided by this class. The two BitSets being compared must be of equal size.
Author:
Aaron Shouldis
See Also:
BitSpliterator

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  BitwiseSpliterator.And
    Implementation of BitwiseSpliterator used to stream the indices of bits that result in the live state after the AND operation, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
    static class  BitwiseSpliterator.Or
    Implementation of BitwiseSpliterator used to stream the indices of bits that result in the live state after the OR operation, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.
    static class  BitwiseSpliterator.XOr
    Implementation of BitwiseSpliterator used to stream the indices of bits that result in the live state after the XOR operation, splitting at appropriate indices to manipulate a BitSet in parallel.

  • Constructor Details

    • BitwiseSpliterator

      protected BitwiseSpliterator​(BitSet set1, BitSet set2, int position, int end)
      Creates a BitwiseSpliterator with the specified starting and ending position. This BitwiseSpliterator will perform bitwise operations on the words of the specified BitSets.
      Parameters:
      set1 - the first BitSet, which will be operated on against set2.
      set2 - the second BitSet, which will be operated on against set1.
      position - (inclusive) the first index to include.
      end - (exclusive) index after the last index to include.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if position is greater than or equal to end, or the sizes of set1 and set2 differ.
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if set1 or set2 are null.

  • Method Details

    • bitwiseFunction

      protected abstract long bitwiseFunction​(long word1, long word2)
      Calculates the result of the bitwise operation represented by this BitwiseSpliterator between the specified words from set1 and set2.
      Parameters:
      word1 - the long word from set1 to be operated against word2.
      word2 - the long word from set2 to be operated against word1.
      Returns:
      the result of the bitwise operation between word1 and word2

    • density

      protected abstract double density()
      Calculates an estimation of the density of bits which will be in the live state in the resulting words of bitwiseFunction(long, long).
      • density(a & b) = density(a) * density(b)
      • density(a | b) = density(a) + density(b) - (density(a) * density(b))
      • density(a ^ b) = density(a) + density(b) - (2 * density(a) * density(b))
      This percentage is calculated on creation of each BitwiseSpliterator, then used in all subsequent calls to estimateSize().
      Returns:
      an estimation of the density of words returned by the bitwiseFunction(long, long) of this BitwiseSpliterator.

    • estimateSize

      public long estimateSize()

    • getExactSizeIfKnown

      public long getExactSizeIfKnown()

    • tryAdvance

      public boolean tryAdvance​(java.util.function.IntConsumer action)

    • forEachRemaining

      public void forEachRemaining​(java.util.function.IntConsumer action)

    • next

      private final int next​(int index)
      Calculates the index of the next live bit after the specified index, including that index. All bits indices, until BitSpliterator.end will be checked. If no live bits are found, BitSpliterator.end is returned.
      Parameters:
      index - (inclusive) the first index to check.
      Returns:
      the index of the next live bit, or BitSpliterator.end if none were found.

    • bitwiseWord

      private final long bitwiseWord​(int wordIndex)
      Calculates the result of bitwiseFunction(long, long) on the words at the specified wordIndex.
      Parameters:
      wordIndex - the word index in set1 and set2 to process.
      Returns:
      the result of bitwiseFunction(long, long) on the words at the specified word index.
